statements: DELETE FROM budget_tool_data WHERE category = 'Food' AND expense > 100;
DELETE FROM budget_tool_data WHERE user_id = 10 AND category = 'Food';
DELETE FROM budget_tool_data WHERE expense > 1000 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 AND category = 'Groceries';
DELETE FROM categories WHERE budget_limit < 500 OR category_name = 'Entertainment';
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE user_id = 1 AND amount > 1000
DELETE FROM budgets WHERE user_id = 1 AND category_id = 3;
